def unique_fruits(fruits):
    seen = set()
    unique = [fruit for fruit in fruits if not (fruit in seen and seen.add(fruit))]
    return unique

mutants.code:
def unique_fruits(fruits):
    seen = set()
    unique = [fruit for fruit in fruits if not (fruit not in seen or seen.add(fruit))]
    return unique
